thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Park, sleep, fly option
thread.title_full: Great Park, sleep, fly option - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: DrDadrwp
title: Great Park, sleep, fly option
text:
We stayed here for one night prior to flying to Europe. The front desk staff were very friendly at check-in and even upgraded us to a one bedroom suite. The suite was good sized with a separate sleeping area, a large and comfortable couch and two comfortable chairs. There was also a dining table and large flat screen TV's. There was a microwave and refrigerator in the room. The beds were comfy, the room was quiet and we were allowed to park our car there while we were gone. Shuttles run every 30 minutes to anf from the airport.
Room Tip: Try to get a suite. They are great! See more room tips
